home.welcome_subtitle: Your ultimate WebXR open-source repository for vocational training.
home.no_workshops: No active workshops at the moment.

tour.welcome_content: Your ultimate WebXR open-source repository for vocational training.
tour.library_content: Browse, filter, and upload new industrial models.
tour.lessons_content: Explore guided 3D learning experiences designed by teachers.
tour.academy_content: Master the platform with video tutorials and pedagogy tips.
tour.help_content: Access tutorials, diagnostics, and support here anytime.
tour.login_content: Already have an account? Log in to access your projects.
tour.signup_content: Create a new account to start uploading models and joining workshops.
tour.profile_content: Manage your settings, view your projects, or log out.
tour.workshops_content: Join live multi-user collaborative sessions in VR.
tour.featured_content: Check out the most popular and high-quality models selected for you.

gallery.title: VET Equipment Repository
gallery.subtitle: Standardized, optimized, and interactive 3D twins.
gallery.no_models: No models found matching your criteria.
gallery.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

help.title: How to use THE GEAR
help.subtitle: Your guide to the ultimate WebXR VET experience.

diagnostics.title: System Diagnostics
diagnostics.meta_quest_tip: For best VR results, use Meta Quest Browser.

vr_start.title: VR Mode Quick Start
req_list: Use the built-in Meta Quest Browser
how_list: Select a model from the Repository

tts.title: Text-to-Speech
tts.description: You can use the built-in Text-to-Speech feature to listen to training tasks and hotspot descriptions.

list.tasks: Training Tasks: Click the speaker icon üîä next to any task in the list.
list.hotspots: Hotspots: Click the speaker icon üîä inside the popup when selecting a part.
list.languages: Languages: The voice automatically switches between English, Serbian, Italian, Greek, Portuguese, and Turkish based on your selected language.

features.title: Features & Roles
features.students_desc: Explore the entire repository, view models in 3D/VR, download standard CAD files (STEP), and join workshops hosted by teachers.
features.teachers_desc: Upload new models (via the + Upload button in Repository), create interactive lessons, host workshops, and track student progress.
features.workshops_desc: Teachers can spawn a "Room" where multiple students can join in VR. Everyone sees the same model and can interact with it together in real-time.
features.sync_desc: Teachers can use the 'Sync Students' toggle to force everyone's view to match theirs, and use the 'Laser Pointer' to highlight specific parts of the model for all participants.
features.exploded_desc: In Assembly Mode, click 'Explode View' to automatically separate all parts of the model outward from the center, allowing you to see internal components.
features.gaze_desc: The AI Mentor knows what you are looking at. Simply gaze at a part for a moment and ask 'What is this?' to get a specific explanation.

learning.title: Interactive Learning & Academy
learning.academy_desc: Access official video training for educators. Learn how to create lessons, manage workshops, and use the platform effectively via the Academy tab.
learning.lessons_desc: Take step-by-step 3D lessons with built-in quizzes. Receive instant feedback and track your progress.
learning.challenges_desc: Put your skills to the test in the 3D environment. Locate specific components (e.g., "Find the Emergency Stop Button") and confirm by clicking the mesh.

ai.title: AI Engine (New)
ai.opt_desc: Large CAD files (STEP/IGES) can be automatically converted into VR-ready GLB models. Use the Optimize button in the Repository.
ai.verdict_desc: Google Gemini analyzes every model to provide technical descriptions and quality assessments.

install.title: Install App (Offline Mode)
install.desktop_inst: Desktop: Click the 'Install App' button in the top bar (if visible) or the install icon in the address bar.
install.android_inst: Mobile: Open the menu and tap 'Install App' or use the browser's 'Add to Home Screen' option.
install.ios_inst: iOS (Safari): Tap the Share button ‚Üí "Add to Home Screen".
install.offline_desc: Once installed, the app works even without an internet connection.
offline_list: Launch the app instantly from your home screen.
View previously opened models and lessons.

analytics.title: 3D Analytics & Heatmaps
analytics.note_desc: You can now track student engagement directly on the 3D models.
analytics.how_works_desc: When students view a model in VR or 3D, the system silently tracks where they are looking. This data is aggregated into a 3D Heatmap.
analytics.viewing_desc: Go to your Teacher Dashboard and click the new "Analytics" tab. Select a model to see a point cloud overlay showing hotspots of student attention.

lti.title: LMS Integration (Moodle/Canvas)
lti.seamless_desc: THE GEAR supports LTI 1.3, allowing you to launch the platform directly from your school's Moodle or Canvas courses.
lti.admin_desc: Use the following endpoints to register THE GEAR in your LTI Provider tool settings:

admin.title: Platform Administration (v2.0)
admin.config_desc: Administrators can customize the platform identity (Branding), fine-tune AI behavior, and manage security settings from the dedicated Admin Settings > Configuration tab.
features: Custom Branding: Change Name and Primary Color site-wide.
AI Tweaks: Select models (Flash/Pro) and set generation creativity.
Model Management: Clone and edit models directly from the library list.
Security: Control public registration and file upload limits.
Backups: Three-tier backup system (JSON, SQL, System ZIP).
File Maintenance: Clean up orphaned files and optimize storage.

builder.title: Workbook & Interactive Quizzes
builder.creation_desc: Teachers can create steps with interactive tasks. Use the Workbook Builder to attach models, add descriptions, and set interactions.
builder.read_desc: Students read text and view the model.
builder.find_part_desc: Students must click on a specific 3D part to proceed.
builder.quiz_desc: Classic single/multiple choice or the new 'Model Identification' (Gamified click-on-part) and 'True/False' checks.
builder.image_tip: Pro Tip: Use Ctrl+V to quickly paste screenshots or diagrams into your steps.

builder.title: Workbook Builder
builder.bloom_tip: "Use Bloom's Taxonomy: Start with 'Identify' steps (Knowledge) before moving to 'Assemble' (Application)."
builder.content_placeholder: Explain what the student should do...
builder.no_model_tip: Select a model in the left panel to begin.
builder.aim_click_tip: AIM & CLICK on the model to place the pin

errors.select_model: Select a 3D model for this step first.

academy.title: GEAR Academy
academy.subtitle: Master the platform and upgrade your teaching methodology. The MOOC Suite provides certified training for VET educators.
academy.no_videos: No videos in this category yet.
academy.cert_desc: Complete all modules to receive your official Erasmus+ VET Digital Educator certificate.

lessons.no_lessons: No lessons found in this sector.
lessons.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this lesson?

viewer.no_model: No model attached to this step.
viewer.click_instruction: Use the 3D view to identify the target part.
viewer.find_instruction: Locate and click on the 3D model part: {{target}}
viewer.find_error: Incorrect. That is part "{{meshName}}". Try again.

editor.desc_placeholder: Brief overview of what this lesson covers...
editor.question: Question
editor.pointer_tip: Link a model, click Pointer, then click the part in the 3D viewer.
editor.paste_img_tip: Click here and paste (Ctrl+V) an image
editor.select_target_tip: Click on the specific part of the model to set it as the target.
editor.intro_content:
# Welcome to this lesson

Start by explaining the topic.

registration.label: Public Registration
registration.desc: When disabled, new users cannot sign up themselves.

max_size.label: Maximum File Size
max_size.desc: Limit for 3D model and other file uploads.

moodle.label: Moodle Integration (LTI)
moodle.desc: Settings for connecting with the school LMS.

branding.label: Custom Branding
branding.desc: Customize the look and name of the platform for your institution.

ai_tweaks.label: AI Tweaks
ai_tweaks.desc: Fine-tune how AI generates lessons and analyzes models.

gamification.label: Activities and Gamification
gamification.desc: Settings for competitions and displaying student results.

announcement.label: Global Announcement
announcement.placeholder: Enter a message to be displayed on the top of the dashboard...

cors.label: Allowed Origins (CORS)
cors.desc: Comma-separated list of domains allowed to access the API (e.g., https://school.edu.rs). Leave empty for defaults.

data_mgmt.title: Data Management
data_mgmt.desc: Backup your data regularly to prevent data loss.
data_mgmt.export_desc: Download a complete JSON dump of all tables.
data_mgmt.restore_desc: Danger: Restoring will overwrite existing data. Use ZIP for full restore (DB + Files) or JSON/SQL for data only.
data_mgmt.restore_confirm:
WARNING: You are about to restore database from "{{filename}}".

Existing data might be overwritten.

Are you sure?

sectors.title: Sector Management
sectors.desc: Manage the list of educational sectors. Rename to fix typos or consolidate categories.
sectors.tip: Tip: New sectors are automatically created when uploading models if they don't exist.
sectors.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete the sector "{{sectorName}}"? This is only possible if no models are using it.
sectors.confirm_rename: Rename "{{editingSector}}" to "{{newSectorName}}"? This will update all associated models.

logs.title: System Logs
logs.desc: View the last 100 lines of server error logs.
logs.load_failed: Failed to load logs. You might not have permission.

library.title: 3D Library Management
library.desc: Manage all uploaded 3D models. Use filters to sort by Sector or Uploader. Promote high-quality models to 'Featured' status or remove inappropriate content.
library.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

orphans.label: Maintenance
orphans.description: These files/folders are present in the uploads directory but are not referenced in the database. They are likely leftovers from deleted models or failed uploads.
orphans.empty: No orphans found. Your storage is clean! ‚ú®
orphans.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete orphan "{{name}}"? This cannot be undone.
orphans.confirm_delete_all: Are you sure you want to delete ALL orphan files? This operation is permanent and cannot be undone!

users.title: User Management
users.subtitle: Manage registered users and their permissions.
users.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

dashboard.title: Teacher Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Monitor student progress and engagement.
dashboard.no_stats: No stats found for your lessons.

modal.title: User Profile
modal.no_models: No models uploaded by this user.
